WorkItem.Description:
HOW TO LOAD TWITTER AND FACEBOOK NOTIFICATIONS ON A WEB APPLICATION???
 
FACEBOOK WALL UPDATES TO BE SHOWN ON MY WEBSITE BY GIVING ACCESS TO USER NAME & PASSWORD.
 
TWITTER UPDATES IN THE SAME WAY AS ABOVE.
WorkItem.Summary: HOW TO SHOW TWITTER, FACEBOOK, UPDATES??? (C#)

Comments.Message:
Hello Bmuzammil

I think that these will require the use of twitter and facebook APIs.  Because these APIs are owned by Twitter and Facebook, you'd better consider asking them in twitter or facebook's forums / support.  Here are some matterials that I found on the internet for your references:

About Facebook:
https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sdks/
http://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/javascript/
http://fishbowl.codeplex.com/

About Twitter:
https://dev.twitter.com/

Have a nice day! 

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Program Manager 
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework
